titles.title: 723 Joy In Serving Jesus (easy nice up beat)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is joy in serving Jesus
As I journey on my way
Joy that fills the heart with praises
Every hour and every day

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
There is joy - joy
Joy in serving Jesus
Joy that throbs within my heart
Every moment every hour
As I draw upon His pow'r
There is joy - joy
Joy that never shall depart

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is joy in serving Jesus
Joy that triumphs over pain
Fills my soul with heaven's music
Till I join the glad refrain

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There is joy in seving Jesus
As I walk alone with God
'Tis the joy of Christ my Savior
Who the path of suff'ring trod

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There is joy in serving Jesus
Joy amid the darkest night
For I've learned the wondrous secret
And I'm walking in the light
